description:
Goku is a legendary warrior and the strongest fighter on the planet, but he`s about to encounter a foe from out-of-this-world. What brings this new menace to Earth? And what`s up with his tail?
Source: hulu

titles.title: Der Kampf beginnt! – Son Goku kehrt zurück
Le début du combat ! Le retour de Son Goku
Prologue to Battle! The Return of Goku!
Tatakai no Makuake! Kaette Kita zo Son Gokuu
闘いの幕開け! 帰ってきたぞ孫悟空
